channel.title: By admin on as a reliable source?
channel.description: wanted to put in my admin account in my source, can anyone help me? I think it has something to do with commands.java. Please, I need help.!

item.title: By admin on as a reliable source?
item.dc:creator: @RS_From_The_00s RS From The 00s
item.description:
@RS_From_The_00s wrote:

You want to be an admin on your server? Find your character save, and change “playerRights = 0” to 2.

If you are running a server like Hyperion/dementhium/matrix, you will have to add this on login, i.e.

def login(player):	
	if player.getName().lower() == 'mod rs':
		player.setRights(Rights.ADMINISTRATOR)

But yours will have to be Java syntax, most likely.

Read full topic
item.source: By admin on as a reliable source?
